p: We obtained 2,354 chemicals either approved by or investigated in clinical trials undertaken by the FDA, the European Medicines Agency (EMA), or other agencies: 1,600 from the Pharmakon-1600 collection (MicroSource Discovery Systems), 326 from the Prestwick Chemical Library (Prestwick Chemical), 103 from the Tocriscreen Library (Tocris Bioscience), and 325 from an in-house library (the Korea Chemical Bank) deposited by domestic chemists. Highly purified sertindole (≥ 97.5%) and ibutamoren (≥ 98%) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich, and raloxifene (≥ 98%) from Santa Cruz Biotechnology. Control antiviral compounds, RBV and favipiravir (T-705; 6-flouro-3-hydroxy-2-pyrazinecarboxamide) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich or chemically synthesized in-house (patent application no., EP1417967A4).
